description:
I've been using this app for about a month now and as a maths major I can say it has helped me write many things nicely much faster than any LaTex editor would (it definitely does not look as good but goes the job), it's sad it's not free in the phone version.
Would improve some things in the formula writing tool and would add a font that matches the formula writer for a better look.
summary: Good app, Almost like a fast LaTex

description: I don't know if they have a piad version or not. I spent a lot of time making many notes in a language that I was learning. I could not review my notes for several months because I was busy. Once I returned, all notes GONE! It is now asking me to make an account or log in. There was no log in procedure the first time; it was simple install and start using the notes. Now all my notes are gone and I did not make backups because I trusted this app. Do not make this mistake again!
